name: Potion Pals: Watch them Spoil!
description:
Generate a potion from an image you drop on the game. (Non-image files will use a random generation). Play with and care for the potion until it dies.

Game is small in scope compared to the length of the Jam, but I still hope you enjoy your potions!

Controls

Use the left mouse button to use the menu and to drag images onto the game.

Audio SFX
  • Sound Effects from GDC Audio Packs
Voice
  • Ashe Thurman - Potion Child
Music
  • Willfor - Who does his own projects as well.
Libraries
  • HUMP - Matthias Richter
    https://github.com/vrld/hump/   
  • Windfield - a327ex
    https://github.com/a327ex/windfield/
  • SYSL-Libraries - Sysl (CHall)
